Не ну знаете? Как виток эволюции Counter Strike даже неплохо. Но почему игра выглядит хуже Half-Life 2 и играется хуже CS 1.6? Так-же в игре очень слабо проработано позиционирование звуков и хитбоксы игроков. Но в остально опять-же разработчики молодцы!

Cara, os graficos do cs: source é muito similar ao cs:go só é bem inferior na parte de recarregar da arma, pois eu acho que é mesma animação do cs, quando os personagens vão recarregar, a animação é meio dura e isso que é o unico ''problema'' que eu achei no jogo, tirando isso o jogo é uma beleza, da pra se divertir bastante
 E pra quem tem aqueles pc ruim de loja que vende geladeira, como o meu, pode ficar tranquilo pq é muito facil pegar 60 fps nisso ai
I'm not good at it so its pretty good.

Much better than CS:GO.

Positives.
Active player base.
Better weapon balance.
Spray big TD anime girls on a wall.

Negatives.
When you die you have to wait a whole round.  (Give me that bot)

-no loot boxes
-no hackers
-no f2p
-community maps
-brings me back to 2008 :)

Call of duty is a sh#t version of CSGO. CSS is fun for muiltplayer and A.I bots deathmatch. It's seem Call of duty will never go back to what made it good in the first place which is campaign story mode. That's where CoD was really good at intil it wanted to be CSGO. CSGO is having it's own problem's but CSS is still the same old fun on what people come back to the Source for. It has not change too much and that's good. It's fun for me and I just started playing and looked at of gameplay of back than and now.

В игре изменили физику стрельбы, она стала более реалистичной. Также добавили физики ко всем предметам и моделям в игре. То есть теперь граната, брошенная на склон, как подобает скатится вниз по склону, нежели как в 1.6 граната попросту прилипнит и взорвётся...конечно новшевств в игре много, не спорю и они все в лучшую сторону

Surprisingly after all these years this game is still quiet active last time i checked. It has been a while since i've been on it but i know it still has countless servers that get filled up. Now obviously this game may not be for everybody since it is old and people who haven't played it back in the day may not enjoy it but it doesn't hurt to try it, you can pick this game up really cheap, especially on sales. IT may be old but its still going strong. Surprisingly this game doesn't have alot of cheaters (Well it depends on what servers you play) For the most part the community has it figured out there are custom Anti-cheats that servers use to prevent cheating and it seems to work pretty well. Overall a great game Highly recommend it.
